parse.title: Scabaras mage

Scabaras mages are monsters encountered during the Dealing with Scabaras quest within the Scabaras Dungeon. They can be killed for the Scabarites slayer assignment. They use an incredibly slow but accurate magic attack. Despite the Scabaras lancers and rangers in the dungeon being aggressive, the mages will ignore players unless attacked.

They have a special attack in which they will say You cannot resist the pestilence from the secret places. and deal poison damage to the player, though this is only visual and does not inflict poison. They may also summon a poisonous scarab swarm while in combat, accompanied by saying May Scabaras's young gnaw upon your bones.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 2 January 2008 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The FunOrb game Armies of Gielinor featured Scabarite mages as a unit for the Menaphite Pantheon faction. In this game, they were able to poison enemy units with their attacks.
  • After they use their special attack or summon a scarab swarm, they will sometimes stop attacking the player and leave combat. This may be a bug.
